refnamediv.refpurpose: Mutes/unmutes new instances of a given instrument.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Mutes/unmutes new instances of a given instrument.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: insnum -- instrument number. Equivalent to p1 in a score i statement.
insname -- A string (in double-quotes) representing a named instrument.
iswitch (optional, default=0) -- represents a switch to mute/unmute an instrument. A value of 0 will mute new instances of an instrument, other values will unmute them. The default value is 0.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: All new instances of instrument inst will me muted (iswitch = 0) or unmuted (iswitch not equal to 0). There is no difficulty with muting muted instruments or unmuting unmuted instruments. The mechanism is the same as used by the score q statement. For example, it is possible to mute in the score and unmute in some instrument.
Muting/Unmuting is indicated by a message (depending on message level).
